named-query.name: instanceCommand.getById
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM InstanceCommand a WHERE a.id = :id

named-query.name: instanceCommand.getAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM InstanceCommand a order by a.id

named-query.name: instanceCommand.getAllActive
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM InstanceCommand a where a.state in ('PENDING', 'QUEUED', 'RUNNING') order by a.id

named-query.name: instanceCommand.getAllPending
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM InstanceCommand a where a.state = 'PENDING' order by a.id

named-query.name: instanceCommand.getAllForUser
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM InstanceCommand a where a.user = :user order by a.id

named-query.name: instanceCommand.getAllForInstance
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM InstanceCommand a where a.instance = :instance order by a.id
